title: Pet Sematary
review: I watched this in the 2022 spooking, but forgot to write a review and only rated it a 6. I saw it again to remind myself before writing this, and in doing so I upgraded my rating. It's fun and quite scary if you don't know what's coming. There's no template for how to show the death of this particular type of person in film, so they do a good job of the difficult task here. Except for the unintentionally funny photo montage seconds after it happens, the before and after is really horrible to watch.
